name: Rhonda S. FENTON, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Respondent
docket_number: Petition, No. 71 Western District Allocatur Docket 1997

parties: Rhonda S. FENTON, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of February, 1998, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED. The parties are directed to speak to the applicability of Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Dep’t of Transp. v. Renwick, 543 Pa. 122, 669 A.2d 934 (1996) and Olbrish v. Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Dep’t of Transp., 152 Pa.Cmwlth. 423, 619 A.2d 397 (1992) to this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
705 A.2d 1297
Rhonda S. FENTON, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 25, 1998.
